title: Step 37

challengeFiles.name: main
challengeFiles.contents:
text = 'Hello World'
shift = 3
alphabet = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
encrypted_text = ''

for char in text.lower():
    index = alphabet.find(char)    
    new_index = index + shift
    new_char = alphabet[new_index]
    print('char:', char, 'new char:', new_char)
challengeFiles.seed:
text = 'Hello World'
shift = 3
alphabet = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
encrypted_text = ''

for char in text.lower():
    index = alphabet.find(char)    
    new_index = index + shift
    new_char = alphabet[new_index]
    print('char:', char, 'new char:', new_char)

tests.text: You should replace new_char with encrypted_text inside your for loop.
You should turn your print() call into print('char:', char, 'encrypted text:', encrypted_text) inside your for loop.

description: Now, replace new_char with encrypted_text. Also, modify the print() call into print('char:', char, 'encrypted text:', encrypted_text) to reflect this change.
